review.title: “Dysfunctional.”
review.pros: Pros – Ryvita (Poole site) brand very profitable for Jordans and generates approx 80% of combined profit.
review.cons: Cons – Significant under investment in Poole (Ryvita) operation.No senior Executive presence on site.Very inward looking - benchmarks always taken within ABF versus external world class organisations.Poor employee engagement scores.Senior Execs too much into the detail failing to empower those beneath them.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
